data.title: What If.
data.meta_description: Burned by bad relationships in his past, medical school dropout Wallace (Daniel Radcliffe) decides to put his love life on hold. After meeting Chantry (Zoe Kazan), an animator who lives with her boyfriend Ben (Rafe Spall), things get complicated. Wallace and Chantry form an instant connection, leading the pair to wonder, what if the love of your life is actually your best friend'
data.text: On August 28, between 8 a.m. and 12 p.m., the Library catalog will be offline for about one hour. You will still be able to search, but some functions like placing holds and renewing checkouts will be unavailable. We apologize for the inconvenience and will remove this message when the maintenance is complete.
